content: Because of Easter, the epitaph on my tomb stone will say: Why seek ye the living among the dead? (Luke 24:5) God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans

content: Our church has an outreach to a face-based youth offender facility. They have 24 14-18 year old boys who would otherwise be serving 6-12 months in jail. This morning we baptized seven of them. We had to get special state authorization. By the by this is the last of the five Florida faith-based programs. I only has six more weeks. The feds with drew the funding for the entire program. God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans
